medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive gait difficulty leading to frequent falls and episodes of vertigo.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The gait difficulty progressed over the course of the last year, leading to increased frequency of falls and episodes of vertigo.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Complicated neonatal jaundice, bilateral cataracts at age twenty, hypothyroidism at age twelve, testicular cancer at age twenty-six, episodic diarrhea with onset 12 months ago, attention deficit and hyperactivity disorder, and dyslexia in puberty.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of hereditary neurological disease; parents are distant cousins.
